homepage-intro-title: The system for managing graduation thesis
homepage-intro-content: Welcome to the Graduation Thesis Management website! We provide a comprehensive online platform to assist students, faculty members, and thesis advisors in managing, monitoring, and evaluating the progress and results of graduation theses.
404-content: Page not found, someone is playing tricks or hiding the page you're looking for.
unauthorized-content: Access denied! Please return to the homepage or try logging in with another account.
